Dr Aashu Thakran- BDS-MDS- Endodontist
Dr. Aashu Thakran is a Dentist in Gurgaon and has an experience of 8 years in this field. She has done her bachelor‚Äôs degree (BDS) from Manav Rachna Dental College, Faridabad in 2016, and her (MDS) in Conservative Dentistry and Endodontics from J.N. Kapoor D.A.V. chains.description: Messages BEFORE you share a preview (to pre-sell value)

templates.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Warm Opener (No Preview Yet)
templates.content:
Hi Dr. Aashu Thakran, I'm Kulkaran.
I help premium dental clinics in Gurugram increase implant/aligner enquiries using a modern, mobile-first website.

I checked The Dental Elegance & Cosmetology Centre online ‚Äî you're offering premium dental services, but your online presence isn't showing that expert trust.

Can I show you a quick 10-second homepage preview?

templates.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ If They Say 'We Don't Need Website'
templates.condition: They say it's going fine without website
templates.content:
Totally fair doctor ‚Äî many clinics feel that way.

The only reason I reached out is because high-ticket services like dental services usually convert better when patients see:
‚Ä¢ before/after results
‚Ä¢ clear treatment trust
‚Ä¢ WhatsApp booking
‚Ä¢ premium clinic branding

If you're open, I'll share a small preview so you can see the difference.

templates.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Preview Delivery Message
templates.content:
Dr. Aashu Thakran, I made a modern homepage preview for The Dental Elegance & Cosmetology Centre.
It's designed to build instant trust for high-ticket cases like dental services.

Here's the sample üëá
{{preview_link_or_text}}

templates.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Micro-Commitment Question
templates.content:
Should I expand this into a full homepage mockup for you?
I'll show 2 styles so you can pick what matches your clinic.

templates.title: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Value Follow-Up (2 Hours)
templates.content:
Just checking doctor ‚Äî did you get a chance to see it?
If you like the direction, I can also design a dedicated dental services page that converts more enquiries.

templates.title: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Next Morning Nudge
templates.content:
Good morning Dr. Aashu Thakran üôÇ
Quick yes/no ‚Äî should I keep working on your homepage mockup, or pause it for now?

templates.title: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Soft Close (Day 3)
templates.content:
Doctor, I'm closing showroom previews today to focus on active projects.
Should I keep The Dental Elegance & Cosmetology Centre's preview on hold if you plan to upgrade this month?
